con:restRequest.name: clone_rule
con:restRequest.con:request: {"ruleId":${#Project#currentRuleUpdateID},"displayName":"Multiple NonStop user sessions-XUA-CLONE1","description":"A terminal has logged into multiple sessions from the same IP address with different user names. Verify this is normal user activity.","turnOffBaseRule":false}
